attributes.action: STOP UK CITIZENS FROM USING BRITISH SOIL TO INCITE VIOLENCE AND HATRED ABROAD
attributes.additional_details:
The purpose of this petition is to make an official request to the UK Home Office and Department of Justice to make it illegal for British Citizens to incite violence or hatred abroad.

At present, we are aware of a dual national UK citizen that is actively leading a political party in his home country and busy inciting violence and hatred to achieve his political objectives using British soil.

Please sign this petition to prevent acts of incitement, persuasions and threats, direct or indirect, intending to cause violence and hatred in foreign countries using British soil.

Peace to the world - help us reach 100,000 signatures!
